SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
CONTACT DATA AND AUDIENCES
Einstein Recommendations Content Dimension Package

The attributes in the Einstein Recommendations Content Dimension Package work with Audience Builder in Marketing Cloud Engagement.

By Content Browse
NOTE Time values are calculated based on the Marketing Cloud Engagement server time, not on your business unit or org’s time zone. The Engagement server uses United States Central Standard Time (CST). Using CST can affect the yesterday value and other values that are related to the recency of data.
